thread.title: The power of the 'purple pound' explained - BBC News
thread.title_full: The power of the 'purple pound' explained - BBC News

title: The power of the 'purple pound' explained - BBC News
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device The power of the 'purple pound' explained 22 February 2017 Last updated at 00:57 GMT 
In the UK, it is thought that some seven million people of working age have a disability, which all adds up to an awful lot of spending power. 
This is known as the "purple pound" and is reckoned to be worth around Â£249bn to the economy. Read more
